page.title: 03OUR SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Before 9 o'clock we put our dinner cards in and go out to play.Later in class we do spellings and sometimes we race with our teacher.On Fridays we present badges and House shields. When it's Maths we do good things like Fractions.Children who haven't done enough work stay in.After play it's Swimming and we go in a Watson's bus to meet Mrs Hill at Catchgate.Next we return for dinner,will it be nice or horrible? On Friday lunchtimes we play records. What will it be next? We'll have to wait and see.We could be doing the { {Domesday Project.}After play we have Games,T.V.Music or Craft.At hometime if we've had 100% all week we go home 10 minutes earlier. A day in school is never boring.
